full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 OF DEPARTMENT OF THE AIR FORCE HEADQUARTERS SPACE AND MISSILE TEST CENTER (AFSC) VANDENBERG AIR FORCE BASE, CALIFORNIA 93437 DEPARTMENT SECURITY SECURITY STATES OF AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT We, John A. Haaren and Wanda H. Haaren do swear that we will jointly support her father Jen Tu Hwang who will be living with us in our home. Our gross salary is $2,055.38 per month as attested by Block 20 of attached Air Force Form 472 (Attachment #1). Our family consists of two children, and we are quite capable of supporting Jen Tu Hwang. John A. Haaren is a Colonel in the U.S. Air Force and a natural born citizen. His Birth Certificate is attached (Attachment #2). Wanda H. Haaren is a naturalized citizen and a copy of her U.S. passport is attached (Attachment #3). 3 Attachments JOHNA A. HAAREN, Colonel, USAF 1. AF Form 472 2. Col John A. Haaren Birth Certificate 3. Wanda H. Haaren copy of Wanda H Haaren U.S. Passport WANDA H. HAAREN (Spouse) I, J. Roberto Moll, the undersigned officer, do hereby certify that the foregoing instrument was subscribed and sworn to before me this 8th day of November 1972 by John A. Haaren, Colonel, USAF, FOIA (b)(6) and Wanda H. Haaren, whose permanent home address is Woodbine Avenue, Larchmont, New York, and who is known to me to be a U.S. Armed Forces member on active duty and the spouse of a U.S. Armed Forces member. And I do further certify that I am at the date of this certificate a commissioned officer of the grade, branch of service and organization stated below in the active service of the United States Armed Forces, that by statute no seal is required on this certificate, and same is executed in my capacity as Assistant Staff Judge Advocate under authority granted to me by Art. 136, UCMJ; 10 U.S.C. 936. Jonnall J. ROBERTO MOLL 580-94-7309, USAF HQ SAMTEC (AFSC) 116 Las Palomas San Juan, P.R.
